name: Dino Hunter Survival Simulator
description:
Become a great dinosaur hunter in Dino Hunter Survival Simulator!

In the sequel of the popular first part of survival series you again got trapped on the deserted island! You already know how to survive so it won’t be hard for you. But if it is your first time you will definitely learn how to craft weapons and hunt on animals. In other words, you will have to do every possible thing to survive this nightmare!

Get some wood and stones, then craft items and build houses. Hunt on animals to get food and stay alive. Build a farm and grow vegetables!

Dino Hunter Survival Simulator
GAME FEATURES:
- New amazing island;
- Open world full of secrets and adventures;
- Create your own farm;
- Get resources and craft useful items;
- Build houses and hide from hungry animals.

Are you ready for Dino Hunter Survival Simulator? Of course you are! Grab your weapons, collect resources and craft items! Good luck!
